data.message: Eminem Slim MarshaLL Mathers the 3rd merry holidayze i hope your xmas is wonderful and joyfull i hope this festive season brings much fun times and making some mad ass beats i hope santa comes by your house and i hope you have a awesome new years and a new year to make new memories i hope all your xmas wishes come true dont forget to sing happy birthday to jesus christ too lol imagine jesus was his own hip hop artist lol well your still the bomb you music is still dope even if not all your tracks werent written by you they are still majestic and i cant wait to f u 4 xmas 2020 *giggles* i wrote you a song ill have to send it to your personal email lol i still have your personal email birthday email you sent me so i hope you get my xmas present i sent you yep another one i hope your getting my prezziez lol
